title: The Entirety of Twitch Has Leaked - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.06.21
description:
Fighting game community aficionados Blessing and Andy tackle a HUGE Twitch data breach, a round up of review round ups, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:11:00 - Housekeeping
It’s a huge embargo day! We have THREE count’em THREE reviews up this morning in the form of TWO count’em TWO Gamescast episodes. The first one is our Far Cry 6 review featuring Greg, Janet, Andy, and Snowbike Mike. That is followed by our Metroid Dread and Nintendo Switch OLED reviews featuring Tim, Andy, and Tamoor Hussain. Both of those episodes are up RIGHT NOW on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and on podcast services around the globe.
Remember! The first episode of The Arkham Files, a Kinda Funny Games Mini-Series where Barrett looks back at what makes each of the Batman: Arkham games so special, premieres next Monday, October 11th, on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames at 2:30pm PT. Join Barrett in the live chat and talk with him about why Arkham Asylum is still a masterclass in design.
Housekeeping Update: The Blessing Show’s newest episode which was gonna premier tomorrow, ACTUALLy now premieres NEXT week Thursday. Roger’s computer exploded overnight so we need a bit more time to polish it, but we promise you it’s a banger.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:14:00 - The entirety of Twitch has reportedly been leaked - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:24:19 - Far Cry 6 Review Round Up
00:34:30 - Metroid Dread Review Round Up
00:39:30 - Ad
00:43:30 - Reviewers dig the Nintendo Switch OLED: ANOTHER Review Round Up
00:52:40 - Rockstar's Own Launcher Seemingly Leaks GTA Remaster Trilogy - Eddie @ GameSpot
00:55:30 - PS3 and Vita PlayStation Stores Will Soon Drop Support For Credit Cards And PayPal - Kat Bailey @ IGN
00:56:55 - The Pokémon Company Signs a Theme Park Deal With Universal Studios Japan - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
01:01:00 - Out today
01:03:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Tim
